description:
Put the insulating power of merino combined with the durability and wicking properties of polyester next to your skin. Mesh ventilation is seamlessly knit against thicker sections to help maximize thermo-regulation.

  • Merino Sport fabric wicks fast to keep you dry and, and is naturally antimicrobial
  • Intraknit™ zoned construction puts insulation and ventilation where you need it most
  • Body-mapped articulation ensures unrestricted movement
  • Slim fit hugs your body for easy layering
  • Seamless knitting produces less waste than traditional cut-and-sew methods
name: Smartwool Intraknit Active Base Layer Bottoms - Women's
